pageTitle: You cannot apply for Pension Credit online
youShouldClaimYourStatePension: You should claim your State Pension first if you are entitled to one.
notEntitledToStatePension: If you are not entitled to a State Pension call the Pension Credit claim line.

northernIreland.youShouldClaimYourStatePension: You should claim your State Pension (opens in a new window or tab) first if you are entitled to one.
northernIreland.notEntitledToStatePension: If you are not entitled to a State Pension call the Pension Credit Application Line.
